verses.name: Numbers 20:19
verses.text: And the children of Israel said unto him, We will go by the high way: and if I and my cattle drink of thy water, then I will pay for it: I will only, without doing any thing else, go through on my feet.

verses.name: Numbers 20:20
verses.text: And he said, Thou shalt not go through. And Edom came out against him with much people, and with a strong hand.

verses.name: Numbers 20:21
verses.text: Thus Edom refused to give Israel passage through his border: wherefore Israel turned away from him.

verses.name: Numbers 20:22
verses.text: And the children of Israel, even the whole congregation, journeyed from Kadesh, and came unto mount Hor.
